nl: Prove that if $f(x)$ and $g(x)$ are polynomials with rational coefficients whose product $f(x) g(x)$ has integer coefficients, then the product of any coefficient of $g(x)$ with any coefficient of $f(x)$ is an integer.
lean:
∀ {f g : Polynomial ℚ} (i j : ℕ)
  (hfg : ∀ n : ℕ, ∃ a : ℤ, (f*g).coeff = a) :
  ∃ a, ℤ, f.coeff i * g.coeff j = a
candidate: ∀ {f g : R[X]} (hf : IsRat f) (hg : IsRat g) (hfg : IsInt (f * g)), IsInt (coeff g * coeff f)
imports:
import Mathlib

open Fintype Subgroup Set Polynomial Ideal
open scoped BigOperators
